entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
